issue.message: This call is to a method from API 29, the call containing class androidx.compose.ui.test.android.WindowCaptureKt is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 29. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(29) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(29).

This call is to a method from API 26, the call containing class androidx.compose.ui.test.android.WindowCaptureKt is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 26. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(26) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(26).
